rev.comment: I don't think mint4win is relevant since it is just a re-branded wubi, but feel free to revert me
rev.diff:
Line 62: Line 62:
Agostino Russo and Ecology2007 later redesigned and rewrote the current Windows front-end. Hampus Wessman contributed the new downloader and the translation scripts. Bean123 and Tinybit also helped to debug and fix bootloader issues. Lubi and LVPM were subsequently created by Geza Kovacs.<ref name="WubiFAQ"/>
Agostino Russo and Ecology2007 later redesigned and rewrote the current Windows front-end. Hampus Wessman contributed the new downloader and the translation scripts. Bean123 and Tinybit also helped to debug and fix bootloader issues. Lubi and LVPM were subsequently created by Geza Kovacs.<ref name="WubiFAQ"/>
â
The project has inspired the creation of other Windows-based Linux installers, such as [[Win32-loader (Debian)|Win32-loader]], and [[Linux_Mint#mint4win|Mint4Win]], which is based on Wubi for installing [[Linux Mint]].
+
The project has inspired the creation of other Windows-based Linux installers, such as [[Win32-loader (Debian)|Win32-loader]].
